name: Megan Potterbusch
body:
##Welcome to the GitHub Page for Megan Potterbusch!
I am a recent graduate of Simmons College with a Masters of Library and Information Science. I look forward to continuing my career in Washington D.C. this August. 

###Check out some of the work that I have done so far in my career.
* [A Voice Thread I created about the Semantic Web] (http://voicethread.com/book.swf?b=5877881)
* [The Astronomy Thesis Collection] (https://zenodo.org/communities/about/astrothesis/), which I created and have curated since we released it to the public.
* [Blog post about making code citable](http://www.software.ac.uk/blog/2015-07-28-making-code-citable-zenodo-and-github)
* [Blog post about the Astronomy Thesis Collection] (http://www.astrobetter.com/blog/2016/04/11/an-open-online-astronomy-thesis-collection/)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

This page was created [using GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
